question: Could you tell me what sunnat duas are to be read after all the Salaats
answer:
QUESTION
could you give me the name of the book or could you send me the dua in Arabic please I find it hard reading it in English transliteration.
ANSWER


Share:
After the Fardh Salaat, one should perform the Sunnat Salaat immediately. Thereafter, one may complete his/her Du?aas or daily practices. There are many Du?aas to be read after Salaat, kindly refer to Hisnul Haseen by Allamah ibn Jawzi.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
